docs.title: Welcome to VectorSearch
docs.text: VectorSearch (VS) is a self-optimizing hybrid indexing system for scalable and memory-efficient vector retrieval.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Quantization-based candidate filtering
  • Lightweight graph refinement
  • Multi-vector support
  • Caching and memory mapping

Start with Getting Started

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
To install all required dependencies and run the system, download and execute the following script:

```bash wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/solmazsm/VectorSearch/master/vectorsearch_system_setup/install_dependencies.sh bash install_dependencies.sh
